thread.title_full: The Essentials of CFOs Summer 2015 Exclusive Kit

title: The Essentials of CFOs Summer 2015 Exclusive Kit
text:
Included in this kit are the following free resources: Receive Your Complimentary eBook NOW! Cash is King -- And So is Your Supply Chain . Mid-Market Companies can Optimize Supply Chain Operations for Strong Cash Flow and Focused Growth 
While cash is important for all businesses, cash flow management is especially vital for mid-market companies in todayâ€™s economic landscape. Because of their size, mid-market companies have a smaller financial war chest than their larger competitors, which means they have a reduced margin of error for the timing of inflows and outflows, a thinner cushion for tough financial situations and a smaller investment pool (including less access to capital) for financing growth. 
As a result, it can take more effort and precision for mid-market companies to remain in a strong cash position. The good news, though, is that every small improvement in cash flow has an even bigger impact on your business. 
This eBook delves into the advances in technology and software that can help your company automate supply chain processes, making managing cash flow easier than ever. What is your annual revenue? Receive Your Complimentary Report NOW! Run Finance a Simpler Way . Helping you transform your finance organization. This report will outline some of the challenges facing organizations like yours and discuss how SAP Simple Finance can help you address them and meet the new demands placed on financial executives.Covered in this report: Helping You Address Today's Financial Challenges Comprehensive, Integrated Finance Solutions Download this report to learn more. Receive Your Complimentary White Paper NOW! The Adobe Document Cloud Advantage for Financial Services . Learn how the Financial Services industry can simplify document communication, reduce costs and speed business. For years, the financial services industry has been facing more competition, commoditization, and regulation. As the industry turns the corner and looks to profitable growth, institutions are realizing that simplifying document communication inside and outside the company, can help reduce costs and speed business. This white paper covers: The strategic advantage of digital document processes How financial industry leaders are transforming their business processes with digital documents How Adobe Document Cloud is the cornerstone of improved business returns Read this white paper to learn more about how the financial services industry can benefit from a digital document solution.
